unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Tadka!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Tadka!**

unnormalised: Hey social media savvy folks! Are you tired of staring at follower counts and guessing what your audience in Mumbai really wants? Well, good news! Follower analytics platforms are getting a major upgrade, offering deeper insights into the Bharatnatyam loving, biryani-obsessed hearts of your followers.
normalised: Hey social media savvy folks! Are you tired of staring at follower counts and guessing what your audience in Mumbai really wants? Well, good news! Follower analytics platforms are getting a major upgrade, offering deeper insights into the Bharatnatyam loving, biryani-obsessed hearts of your followers.

unnormalised: Forget generic data! Think demographics down to the district level, preferred chai-time (around 4 PM, naturally!) content, and even sentiment analysis based on their comments during the India vs. Pakistan cricket match on 15/08/1947 (okay, maybe not *that* far back, but you get the gist!).
normalised: Forget generic data! Think demographics down to the district level, preferred chai-time (around four P M, naturally!) content, and even sentiment analysis based on their comments during the India versus Pakistan cricket match on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven (okay, maybe not *that* far back, but you get the gist!).

unnormalised: Local influencer marketing agency, "Desi Influence," claims this granular data has boosted their campaign ROI by 25% in just one quarter. They even used it to optimize campaign timings around Diwali last year. Apparently, posting about festive sales at 09:00 hrs wasn't as effective as waiting until after Lakshmi Puja!
normalised: Local influencer marketing agency, "Desi Influence," claims this granular data has boosted their campaign R O I by twenty five percent in just one quarter. They even used it to optimize campaign timings around Diwali last year. Apparently, posting about festive sales at zero nine hundred hours wasn't as effective as waiting until after Lakshmi Puja!

unnormalised: These enhanced analytics are a game changer for understanding your audience’s preferences and tailoring content that truly resonates. It’s like having a digital pandit predict your campaign's future. So ditch the guesswork and dive into the data! Your wallet will thank you! Launched fully nationwide by 26/01/2024, expect it to be everywhere.
normalised: These enhanced analytics are a game changer for understanding your audience's preferences and tailoring content that truly resonates. It's like having a digital pandit predict your campaign's future. So ditch the guesswork and dive into the data! Your wallet will thank you! Launched fully nationwide by twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four, expect it to be everywhere.
